question: Who among the following rulers built Adhai Din ka Jhopada in Ajmer?
explanation: Sultan Qutb-ud-din Aibak built two mosques: Quwwat-ul-Islam Mosque in Delhi and Adhai Din Ka Jhopada in Ajmer. He also started the construction of Qutub Minar in memory of famous Sufi Saint Khwaja Qutubuddin Bakhityar Kaki.
